translations: n．年龄者：指不同年龄段的人。

sentences.sentence: But I found my children needed me more when they were teen-agers than they did at age 3 or 4.
sentences.translation: 但是，我发现我的孩子在十几岁的时候比在三四岁时更需要我。

sentences.sentence: He staffed the ships with volunteers, many of them teen-agers, who called themselves the Sea Organization.
sentences.translation: 这些船上都配备了志愿者，其中很多人只有十几岁，他们把自己叫做海洋机构。

sentences.sentence: They seemed like normal teen-agers, although they all had the faintly glamorous, knowing aura of city kids.
sentences.translation: 他们看起来都是很普通的青少年，但是又都有一些微弱的魅力，因为他们很了解城市孩子的习气。
